js.description: js assets to copy on build, vendor source file  > target build file

css.description: Array of strings of source files. CSS files are concatenated to base.css and so have no unique target

img.description: image directory names and the vendor path, directories are relative to the vendor path

fonts.description: array of fonts to copy when building base, relative to the vendor path

modules.description: array of strings of modules used in this app

options.description: browserify command options for non-base modules
